Desc.entry: A registered charity, membership is open to local players (Sheffield and locality) aged 13-21 years of age. Most members are still at school, some at college and many training as professional musicians. The Orchestra meets 3 times a year during the holiday periods. Admission is by audition and a high standard of ability is expected.

ContactName.entry: Edward Woodhead, Deputy Head of Sheffield Music Service/Elsie Elliott
